Lists.desc: Changed Adjusted the frequency at which the dmx agent is run with prx again.
Lists.details:
• Default cycle 20 times: The default cycle is 10 seconds, and can be set with the interval option in the prx.conf file.

  • After that, it tries to re-run 10 times every minute, then 5 times every 10 minutes, and afterwards every hour.
When querying the free space, a query timeout occurs. So a different view is provided depending on the option.

Lists.desc: Changed Added the sequence in object_info.
Fixed Fixed the SIGSEGV issue when there is any file with a long file name (32 characters or more) in the same path as the agent.
